extendedInfo.description: If you are a fan of guns, love driving, and enjoy killing zombies, letâs go!!It's a real 3D driving game!Game Features:Kill zombies and dead walkers in highway3 different scenes of the desolated worldMore than 10 types of exciting guns8 vehicles of various characteristicsUpgradeable powerful Particle Canon SystemMission Mode and Endless Mode to fully test your gaming skillsChallenging game difficulty that demands practicingStory:A severe headache suddenly awaked you. Looking out of the window, it takes you no time to learn the Doomsday had finally come. The city had fallen to zombies and became terrifying ruins. Several zombies turned their blood stained heads to this direction as they had smelled a living person. Quickly they dashed to you and there was just enough time to lift your arms: left to control the steering wheel and right to fire the gun at the zombie roaring a glass away. Its head exploded, its blood sprayed all over the car window. Step heavily on the gas with your last strength, you started the vehicle and crashed zombies in your way. Now itâs time to break out the garage and run for your life! You are a skillful mechanic in the game. To save your life, you have to constantly upgrade your vehicles and canons. Drive your vehicles flexibly to crash zombies into pieces and remember the rule: âshoot the head or you will be deadâ!

reviews.title: Top ace, if ya got time
reviews.comment: This game is so fun and addictive, only down-side is that you have go get your credit card out to really play it. But bloody good..
reviews.author: Frode J. P. Sorensen

reviews.title: Victor Ramirez
reviews.comment: This game is loads of fun and I think lot\'s of people would enjoy it however I\'m giving this game 2 stars maybe even 3 only because when I do an in game purchase it doesn\'t show up at all. Does anyone know what I\'m doing wrong and why even though I\'m spending my actual money my in the game it doesn\'t show up while I\'m playing. I buy xtra coins with my own money but my gold count reader says the same amount. Can any 1 help or do I got to contact the game designers. Pls help & lemme know ASAP thanks 4 ur help
reviews.author: Victor Ramirez

reviews.title: This game is about cool cars and cool guns
reviews.comment: This is a badass game ya sho down load this game im shure your going to Love et
reviews.author: Cris Hernandez

reviews.title: Offer wall
reviews.comment: I keep doing tasks off the offer wall and it won\'t give me my reward when I\'m done. What am I doing wrong. 5 stars other than that. very fun game
reviews.author: zach fellers

reviews.comment: it is happy to play!  Because of the shocking sounds effect! :)
reviews.author: Kitlouie Abragan

reviews.title: Fun easy to follow. Just Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome simply cool
reviews.author: Cody Raulerson

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: Weak gameplay.  Oh, and if you want to upgrade without spending a butt ton of money, then you\'ll be playing this game for a few years.  I\'ll pass.
reviews.author: Mike H.

reviews.title: Kill zombies and time
reviews.comment: Excellent game, very addictive. Cant get enough of it. Guns are awesome. Good graphics n nice cars. One request though add more missions. Almost at the end.
reviews.author: Waseem Ali

reviews.title: 314 am and still playing
reviews.comment: Cant get enough. .. done spent $25 too lol.. download it and you will be happy!
reviews.author: shannon ward

reviews.title: AWSOME GAME
reviews.comment: Very good game. Very different then the same \'ol zombie shooter. Very refreshing to play something this dif. Highly recomended and fun as h*#l!!
reviews.author: Stephanie Tremblay

reviews.title: Dont waste your time or money on this game its a ripoff
reviews.comment: This game sucks because when I spent money to play It just started shuting down so I want my money back Google and the maker of this game are crooks in my book iy played great until I spent real money in game now that they got my money it just shuts off after a few seconds
reviews.author: Donald Davis

reviews.title: Entertaining!
reviews.comment: You can get addicted to this game easy. It\'s fun knocking Zombies off your vehicle.
reviews.author: Denis Verdecia

reviews.title: Well designed
reviews.comment: Good graphics, intense game play. The longer you play, the better you have to get.
reviews.author: Richard Tenney

reviews.title: Great addiction
reviews.comment: This is one addiction that doesnt cost me so much money and has good graphics. Books are so silly when you can run over zombies lol. YEASAA
reviews.author: Roger Hays

reviews.title: A game made by some tough people
reviews.comment: I wonder how unfriendly the developers could be while playing this game! I\'m sure this is not a game to be played with fun, rather it\'s acting as a million dollar game. You will be sweating to the end, showing all skill, and still you are underpowered, designed for taking your money out. Having this kind of attitude is very bad by the developers for gamers. So no matter how nice the game is, it\'s a one star, as there is no zero star!
reviews.author: Miraz Rahman

reviews.comment: It just takes me to home whenever I click story mode it won\'t even let me play plz fix and if it good I will rate 5 :D
reviews.author: Adam Cisneros

reviews.title: Pretty fun
reviews.comment: This game is pretty fun to play it takes sometime to really get the hang of it when you do you should like it
reviews.author: Nick Freeman

reviews.title: Xoom 2
reviews.comment: Not to bad for a free game but the whole game is geared to parting you with real cash and when you do missions there are WAY TO MANY screens you have to go through to restart would rather pay for the game and not have all the in game purchase bullshit. Only been playing for a couple of hours so not sure if it\'s possible to advance without in app purchasing.
reviews.author: Stephen Homer

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Game play is alright but needs better graphics and cheaper arms.
reviews.author: F Mitchell

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I am playing this game from last a month..i am on 93rd mission widout spending even one rs...tottally addictive..
